channel.title: Navan Badminton Club
channel.description: Welcome to Navan Badminton Club located at Claremont Stadium in Navan, Co. Meath, Ireland. Club nights every Monday and Wednesday during the season which runs from September to April. Club caters for Adults and Juveniles of all standards from beginner to advanced.

item.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üéæüè∏ Game Night Announcement
item.description: Join us for our first home match of the new season. Exciting matches await with Navan 'A' vs Skryne starting at 8pm. Come and cheer for our team!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Shuttle Time!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for some shuttle action! All ages welcome. Sign up by Friday, 20th September to join a team. Juvenile Club returns tonight!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)
